articles.description: ‘Dance Monkey’ has officially joined YouTube’s Billion Views Club.
articles.content:
Dance Monkey has officially joined YouTubes Billion Views Club.
This comes three months after the track was certified a billion streamer by APRA AMCOS on all major streaming services, the fastest Aussie song to reach the milestone.
The video, which grew out… [+1896 chars]

articles.title: Ryan Seacrest breaks his silence after American Idol 'episode' - Yahoo Lifestyle Australia
articles.description: Fans were left concerned for Ryan’s health after he appeared to slur his words while hosting American Idol.
articles.content:
Ryan Seacrest has returned to his morning talk show Live with Kelly and Ryan and broken his silence after fans became concerned for his health when the seasoned host appeared to slur his words while hosting American Idol.

articles.title: WWE legend Owen Hart’s widow Martha reflects on husband’s tragic death - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: WWE legend Owen Hart’s widow Martha reflects on husband’s tragic death
articles.content:
Twenty-one years after her husbands death, the widow of WWE legend Owen Hart insists she doesnt hold any grudges. But Martha Hart will never not point the finger at WWE.
Owen Hart died May 23, 1999 at a WWE (then WWF) pay-per-view in Kansas City after fallin… [+4006 chars]

articles.description: MasterChef’s Ben Ungermann, who has been charged over the sexual assault of a 16-year-old girl, has broken his silence on the allegations on social media.
articles.content:
MasterChefs Ben Ungermann, who has been charged over the sexual assault of a 16-year-old girl, has broken his silence on the allegations on social media.
Mr Ungermann shared a tweet made by a man claiming to act for the cooking show contestant.

articles.description: Authorities have scaled back the search for Shad Gaspard after he was swept out to sea.
articles.content:
The search for former WWE star Shad Gaspard has reportedly been scaled back after he was swept out to sea in Southern California on Sunday.
